metadata.Title: CVE-2018-21016 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: audio_sample_entry_AddBox() at isomedia/box_code_base.c in GPAC 0.7.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
